file_content.text:
Urgent! House Organa seeks aid! It is now clear that the despots of House Ulgo will not accept a peaceful resolution. House Ulgo has acquired a massive weapons stockpile from their underworld contacts. A renewed assault on our holdings appears inevitable.
House Organa seeks loyal and talented agents willing to destroy the Ulgo weapons stockpile and bring Alderaan closer to peace. A reward is offered to any agent who is successful.
For House Organa!
